pdf.body:
<#if subsidiary.id == "10"> 
  
    

      Place of supply:
      ${record.custbody_in_gst_pos}
    
    

      State:
      ${record.custbody_in_gst_pos?keep_after("-")}
    
    

      Code:
      ${record.custbody_in_gst_pos?keep_before("-")}
    
  
</#if>
  

<#assign summary_info = record.custbody_bbs_json_summary?eval>
			
<#if summary_info?has_content>
  
      <#list summary_info as item>
          <#if item_index==0>
              
                  

                      Description
                      Quantity
                      Unit Price
                      Tax Rate
                      Amount
                  
              
          </#if>
          

              ${item.salesDescription}
              ${item.quantity?string["#,##0"]}
              ${item.symbol}${item.unitPrice?string["#,##0.00"]}
              ${item.vatRate}
              ${item.symbol}${item.amount?string["#,##0.00"]}
          
      </#list>
  
</#if>



	

       
      ${record.subtotal@label}
      ${record.subtotal}
      
      

       
      ${record.taxtotal@label}
      ${record.taxtotal}
      
      

       
      ${record.total@label}
      ${record.total}
	


  
<#if subsidiary.id == "10"> 
  
      

        Billing Information
      	
      
      

        GSTIN:
        06AACCO6506A1ZZ
      
      

        PAN:
        ${subsidiary.custrecord_in_permanent_account_number}
      
  
</#if>
